casebody.data:
NEW YORK, NEW HAVEN & HARTFORD RAILROAD COMPANY, Plaintiff in Error, v. George EPSTEIN, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 16, 1928. No. 111. John M. Gibbons, of New York City (E. R. Brumley and E. J. Moore, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. John C. Robinson, of New York City (Morris A. Wainger, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
